resources.string: Melissa Reddy Saudi Arabia not giving up on Messi | Salah, KDB targeted for future Saudi Arabia has not thrown in the towel on convincing Lionel Messi to join Cristiano Ronaldo in elevating their league, despite discussions with PSG over a new contract.

Al Nassr Cristiano Ronaldo, right, fights for the ball against Al Ettifaq Abdallah Khateeb Football Al Nassr boss: Ronaldo will return to Europe Cristiano Ronaldo will return to play again in Europe after his spell in Saudi Arabia, according to his head coach at Al Nassr.

Argentina midfielder Enzo Fernandez won the Best Young Player award at the 2022 World Cup Chelsea Chelsea not giving up on Fernandez deal before Tuesday deadline Chelsea have not given up on trying to sign Benfica midfielder Enzo Fernandez before January transfer window closes on Tuesday.
Football Aberdeen appoint Robson interim manager after Goodwin sacking Aberdeen have appointed Barry Robson as interim first team manager following Jim Goodwin sacking.

John Egan made it 3-3 deep into injury-time Reports and Highlights Sheff Utd late goal denies fearless Wrexham in six-goal thriller John Egan scored a 95th-minute equaliser to salvage an FA Cup fourth-round replay with Wrexham after a thrilling 3 3 draw at the Racecourse Ground.

Rangers James Tavernier celebrates scoring a penalty to make it 1 0 Scottish Premiership match reports Rangers extend unbeaten run under Beale Rangers remain unbeaten under Michael Beale after a controversy filled victory over 10 man St Johnstone at Ibrox.

Josh Laurent celebrates scoring Stoke second against Stevenage Stoke see off Stevenage to reach fifth round Evans Ref admitted mistake on pen Stevenage FA Cup run came to an end as they were defeated 3 1 by Stoke in an entertaining tie.

Liverpool Robertson: We let the fans down Klopp We will not fall apart Andrew Robertson said Liverpool let their fans down in their FA Cup fourth-round loss to Brighton while Jurgen Klopp vowed his struggling side will not fall apar.

Football Newcastle transfer rumours: Forest make approach to sign Shelvey With the 2023 January transfer window now open, we round up Newcastle done deals, plus the players linked with moves in and out of St James Park.

Newcastle have signed Anthony Gordon from Everton Gordon seals £45m Newcastle move Tells Everton fans stick by the team Newcastle have completed the £45m transfer of Anthony Gordon from Everton making him the club second most expensive signing.
